name: A Horse and his Mail
description:
A Horse and his Mail is a heartfelt story about one horse and his desperate attempt to traverse a mildly dangerous island in search of his mail.
One might compare the style to Banjo & Kazooie, had it instead been made in a single day and focused on a horse.

Basic controls are WASD for movement, and right click to move the camera around and change direction. The mouse scroll allows zoom in/out.
No guarantees on bugs fixed in this game because, like I mentioned, it was made in a day. Enjoy!
